scripts.pullDB: dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold "Server=DESKTOP-RAQBS6C\SQLEXPRESS; Database=EmployeeDB; Trusted_Connection=True; TrustServerCertificate=True" Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer --context-dir Persistence --context-namespace Infrastructure.Persistence --output-dir ../Domain/Entities --namespace Domain.Entities --no-onconfiguring -t Employee -t JobDepartment -t Leave -t Payroll -t Qualification -t Salary -t Users --force
